title: App for Мac OS X
description: Pomodoro timer for Mac OS X
security_hint: If you'll see warning “‘Pomidorko.app’ can’t be opened…”, open System Preferences, in Security & Privacy click on lock, and in the bottom part of the window select ”Anywhere”
shortcut_hint: To make global play-pause keyboard shortcut work, check the checkbox for Pomidorko in Security & Privacy in section Privacy
